p: In a long time perspective, the loss of jobs related to caribou production and restructuring of the life style does not come without its psychological challenges. This is also observed for wildfires in the Mediterranean area [ 54]. And, as concluded by several researchers, e.g., Ostry et al. [ 19], the rural population is especially vulnerable to such changes. The potential of future deep seated fires in Arctic areas is also a concern. The possible change of arctic areas from mega scale carbon storage areas to mega scale CO 2 releasers, increasing the global CO 2 concentration and accelerating the global warming, is a major general concern. This late September 2007 North face megafire can be a warning sign for future health concerns in the Arctic areas.
